mapper.insert:
insert into receivable_settlement (id, updated_at, status, created_scene, type, policy_type, policy_id, policy_no, endorsement_id, endorsement_no, bill_id, bill_name, agent_id, agent_name, agent_type, agent_fee_rate, agent_tax_rate, agent_is_include_tax, exclude_tax_premium, fee, fee_rate, fee_money, exclude_tax_fee, enabled, enabled_at, created_at, personnel_id, org_id, premium, is_include_tax, insurance_id, period_index, tax_rate, tax_money, settle_at, insured_at, interface_field_id, interface_field_name, include_tax_settle_money) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.updatedAt}, #{item.status}, #{item.createdScene}, #{item.type}, #{item.policyType}, #{item.policyId}, #{item.policyNo}, #{item.endorsementId}, #{item.endorsementNo}, #{item.billId}, #{item.billName}, #{item.agentId}, #{item.agentName}, #{item.agentType}, #{item.agentFeeRate}, #{item.agentTaxRate}, #{item.agentIsIncludeTax}, #{item.excludeTaxPremium}, #{item.fee}, #{item.feeRate}, #{item.feeMoney}, #{item.excludeTaxFee}, #{item.enabled}, #{item.enabledAt}, #{item.createdAt}, #{item.personnelId}, #{item.orgId}, #{item.premium}, #{item.isIncludeTax}, #{item.insuranceId}, #{item.periodIndex}, #{item.taxRate}, #{item.taxMoney}, #{item.settleAt}, #{item.insuredAt}, #{item.interfaceFieldId}, #{item.interfaceFieldName}, #{item.includeTaxSettleMoney} )
